metadata.title: CVE-2025-0247 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 133 and Thunderbird 133. Some ofthese bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that withenough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrarycode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
